article_title: Are Healthcare Costs Really Getting Better?

article_metadata.description: A series of news reports over the past weeks have trumpeted the low rate of growth in healthcare costs. “Health care spending grows at lowest-ever rate,” declared USA Today. “Growth in health care costs flat, but will it last?” asked the Houston Chronicle. “Health Spending Rises Only Modestly,” read a slightly more tempered headline in [...]
article_metadata.author: Castlight
